title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2C.124 - SNOWPLOW TURN Sign (NYW9-26)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2C.124 - SNOWPLOW TURN Sign (NYW9-26)

State Regulations

Option: 01 The SNOWPLOW TURN (NYW9-26) sign (see Sign Drawing
SD-W39) may be used to warn of locations where snowplows regularly turn
around. Guidance: 02 The SNOWPLOW TURN sign should be used only where terrain
and roadway features limit approach sight distance and it is impractical to
move the turning point to a more visible location. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2C.124

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
